s: I used the same brand in both. Both devices nearly the same size. One was $1. One was $40. In short, this device does work as it's designed to and it probably does enhance the efficacy of your serum somewhat, I don't doubt that any vibration would. But it's really only worth spending this much if you have money to burn.
